block.p: American League BOSTON RED SOX--Announced RHP Pedro Martinez withdrew the appeal of his five-game suspension. TEXAS RANGERS--Purchased the contract of OF Scarborough Green from Oklahoma of the PCL. Optioned SS Kelly Dransfeldt to Oklahoma. Designated C Cesar King of Oklahoma for assignment.

American League BOSTON RED SOX--Announced RHP Pedro Martinez withdrew the appeal of his five-game suspension. TEXAS RANGERS--Purchased the contract of OF Scarborough Green from Oklahoma of the PCL. Optioned SS Kelly Dransfeldt to Oklahoma. Designated C Cesar King of Oklahoma for assignment.

NATIONAL LEAGUE ATLANTA BRAVES--Placed OF Reggie Sanders on the 15-day disabled list. Purchased the contract of INF Steve Sisco from Richmond of the International League. CINCINNATI REDS--Placed RHP Pete Harnisch on the 15-day disabled list. MILWAUKEE BREWERS--Placed OF Geoff Jenkins on the 15-day disabled list.
Women's National Basketball Association LOS ANGELES SPARKS--Signed G Kristin Clark.
